name: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands (Limited Collector's Edition)
summary:
- Prince of Persia : The Forgotten Sands game 
- 2 unlockable skins (Malik Skin + Sandwraith Skin) 
- 1 unlockable stage (The Arena) 
- 3 x Lithographic images 
- Token to download Prince of Persia Classic from Xbox Live Arcade or Playstation Network at no extra charge 
- DVD Bonus disc, featuring: 
 • game soundtrack 
 • a unique image gallery 
 • game trailers 
 • and exclusive wallpapers and screensavers
